name: Serverless Forms
description: NodeJS app to send form submissions by email

MESSAGE.description: Message to displayed after the form submission. May contain HTML. Default: 'Thank you for your submission.'

EMAIL_HOST.description: SMTP config: hostname or IP address to connect to (defaults to ‘localhost’)

EMAIL_PORT.description: SMTP config: port to connect to (defaults to 587 if is secure is false or 465 if true)

TO.description: Email address to send the form to (your email)

FROM.description: Email address to use as sender address

SITE_NAME.description: Name of your site, will be displayed in the email title
